title: 2.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Write a pseudocode and JavaScript program to switch on and off the fan based on the fan status and room temperature. The following are the conditions:
● If the fan is off and the temperature exceeds 30 degrees Celsius, switch on the fan.
● If the fan is on and the temperature exceeds 30 degrees Celsius, display that the fan is already running.
● If the fan is off and the temperature is less than 30 degrees Celsius, display that the fan is already stopped.
● If the fan is on and the temperature is less than 30 degrees Celsius, switch off the fan.
